TopicTitle: Request for a new career mode: prestige/commercial mode

Articles.Content:
One thign that I am peeved regarding the current 3 modes is that, while there is science mode, it does not have the complement, an official prestige/finance mode

So what that does is, instead of trying to earn science points (so you will have to start with potato rocket), You will start with all the tech tree unlock, but quite limited in money. Also, the prestige used in Career mode will affect how complicate a contract may exist.

This means that, while you have all the tech in disposal, you have to use them to gain maximum finance return or minimal finance penalty.

Edited August 21, 2019 by Jestersage
